resources.string: How to use: When other applications call the system camera to take photos, you can use this camera to select pictures directly from the album.
Note: This app simulates the camera app and does not have hook camera data, so it cannot replace the internal camera of the app, such as WeChat.
The camera has set the default app, and the camera selection will pop up after resetting the default app.
The permission acquisition failed, and the permission is released before it can be used normally.
File access is not turned on, do you want to open it?
